final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Purchase order received] --> B[Check stock availability]
    B -->|product not in stock| C{XORGateway}
    C -->|product not in stock| D[Reject order]
    D --> E[Order rejected]
    C -->|product in stock| F[Retrieve product from warehouse]
    F --> G[Confirm order]
    G --> H{ParallelGateway}
    H --> I[Get shipment address]
    H --> J[Emit invoice]
    I --> K[Ship product]
    J --> L[Receive payment]
    K --> M{ParallelGateway}
    L --> M{ParallelGateway}
    M --> N[Archive order]
    N --> O[Order fulfilled]
